channel.title: Need help editing npcs behaviour
channel.description: i am making an adminzone and and adding loads of monsters 1 of them is greater demon i have autospawned him but when he is near he automatically attacks you. i want tit to be like that when your near him he just stands their until you attack him if you get what im saying?
